trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when you attempt to do work on a transaction that cannot accept new work.
trans-unit.target: 當您嘗試在無法接受新工作的交易上執行工作時，所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionException> is a recoverable error, and all the exceptions thrown by the <xref:System.Transactions> infrastructure derive from this exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionException> 且可復原的錯誤，所擲回的例外狀況<xref:System.Transactions>基礎結構衍生自這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Transactions.TransactionException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Transactions.TransactionException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Transactions.TransactionException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Transactions.TransactionException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains a message that explains why the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，其中包含說明例外狀況發生原因的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Transactions.TransactionException" /> class with the specified message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的訊息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Transactions.TransactionException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object that describes a failed serialization.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 物件，描述已失敗的序列化作業。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object that describes a failed serialization context.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 物件，描述已失敗的序列化內容。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Transactions.TransactionException" /> class with the specified serialization and streaming context information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的序列化和資料流內容資訊，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Transactions.TransactionException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains a message that explains why the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，其中包含說明例外狀況發生原因的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception instance that causes the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 取得造成目前例外狀況的例外狀況執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" /> 屬性 (Property)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Transactions.TransactionException" /> class with the specified message and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的訊息和內部例外狀況初始化 <see cref="T:System.Transactions.TransactionException" /> 類別的新執行個體。
